data.text: @MontyScot @BatAbility @LotekWireless @WCL_News @CIEEMnet @CountrysideNews @environmentjob @BritishEcolSoc @Brit_Bats @NorthernBats @BatsinChurches Do get in touch with our Training and Conferences Manager Naomi about that: training@bats.org.uk

@_BCT_ @LotekWireless @BatAbility @WCL_News @CIEEMnet @CountrysideNews @environmentjob @BritishEcolSoc @Brit_Bats @NorthernBats @BatsinChurches The CCP really implements an ecological extinction plan for human beings. Sparrows have completely disappeared in some Chinese cities, pangolins have been commercially "extinct", baiji dolphins have become extinct, The extinction of plants and animals is irreversible.

@_BCT_ @LotekWireless @BatAbility @WCL_News @CIEEMnet @CountrysideNews @environmentjob @BritishEcolSoc @Brit_Bats @NorthernBats @BatsinChurches 中共真對人類實施生態滅亡計劃，麻雀已經在中國一些城市完全消失，穿山甲已被商業性「滅絕」，高鼻羚羊滅絕，白鳍豚滅絕，动植物灭绝不可逆转。

@_BCT_ @BatAbility @LotekWireless @WCL_News @CIEEMnet @CountrysideNews @environmentjob @BritishEcolSoc @Brit_Bats @NorthernBats @BatsinChurches Any student discount available? Not BCT member but local group member too.
